segments.text: In this indoor scene, everything appears so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a plate, her back to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing the sink to flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damages the lower cabinets as it flows down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the cleanup ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are focused on their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble with the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, adding to the secretive fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light from the tidy garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plants line the path outside, so orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This hidden naughtiness might lead to a scolding later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor things, enjoying their moment before it's discovered.
segments.speaker: PAR
